input.sentences: i was heading to work yesterday .
i spied a strange old man following me .
i tried to lose him in the market .
i did n't see him again .
output.sentences: REMEMBER BACK IN THE DAY WATCHING FILM SHOWS
WHEN OLD LADIES COULD GO TO TGHE CORNER AND GET MILK AND BREAD WITH THE HELP OF THE GENTELEMEN OF THE TOWN
WHEN STORES WERE ALL LITTLE TABLES WITH TENTS AND A SHABBY MERCHANT BEHIND IT
WHEN CARPOOLING TO WORK WAS THE MEN JUMPING ON A TRUCK FULLED WITH MEN ON THE WAY TO A MINE
EVEN THROUGH TECHNOLOGY HAS THRIVED DO WE EVER LOOK BACK AND THINK MAYBE IT WAS MENT TO BE DONE THAT WAY
